6 months

2: 6
4: 12
6: 18

8 months

2: 6
4: 12
6: 18
8: 18+36=54

10 months

2: 6
4: 12
6: 18
8: 54
10: 54+36+36=126

12 months

2: 6
4: 12
6: 18
8: 54
10: 126
12: 126+36+36=198

14 months

2: 6
4: 12
6: 18
8: 54
10: 126
12: 198
14: 198+36+36*6+6=456

16 months

16: 456+
